divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were driving( in separate cars)along turnpike road near the intersection of moose meadow road in willington, ct when we observed a stationary blue circular object just above the tree line ahead of us. the object then made a short movement from left to right and stopped briefly then it zig and zag and just speed out of sight heading away from us in the direction we were driving. my wife does not really believe in ufo's but the next day as i as i started to tell our son about what i saw, my wife interrupted me and said she meant to tell what she had seen and she described the exact thing i had seen. the object did not move either in the direction or speed of any aircraft i have ever seen. i did observe two blueish object way off in the distance as i proceeded down turnpike road and turned onto westford hill road in ashford. they were not airplanes as they remained stationary in the sky. they did appear to have a red light but they were far enough away that i could not make out any other details with the naked eye. they were not stars either. i believed at that time that it was likely a ufo. i looked up another ufo web site saw a drawing showing a blue globe\circular object(ufo) that looked exactly like what both my wife and i saw. on tuesday evening december 22, 2009 my son and i were out on our back deck using his i phone to look at\id constellations when directly along the tree line looking north a orange\yellow fireball zoomed across the sky from the east to west. it looked like the scene out of the move armageddon. not sure what it was. we did observe other shooting stars--typical white light streaks.
